sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含有"会，会议"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: conference, congress, assembly, meeting, rally, council, session, convention, gathering
means: conference ： 正式用词，一般指大型会议，如政府工作会议、国际学术交流会议、各国之间的协商、会谈等。
congress ： 指国会、议会、代表大会等机构，尤指经选举产生的国家立法机构的大会或由这些机构召开的大会，也可指专业人员代表大会。
assembly ： 多指一个通常有许多人参加、计划好的，为某一特殊目的而召集的会议。
meeting ： 普通用词，词义广泛。指一般性的会议，可用于任何场合。
rally ： 指大规模的群众性政治集会。
council ： 在国际上多指由各国代表参加的政治会议，或常设的政治机构。在国内、地方上，此词多指常设的政务领导机构，如市政委员会等。
session ： 一般指议会等召开的正式会议。
convention ： 侧重指某一政党或团体为某一特殊目的而召开的会议；也可指学术团体的年会。
gathering ： 指两人以上的聚会或集会，强调非正式性。

sentence.Network_en: The lighthouse beam was quite distinct in the gathering dusk.
sentence.Network_cn: 灯塔的光束在渐浓的暮色中清晰可见。

sentence.Network_en: The auguries of death are fast gathering round his head.
sentence.Network_cn: 死亡凶兆迅速地在他脑海中盘旋。

sentence.Network_en: Dr Ryan travelled the world gathering material for his book.
sentence.Network_cn: 瑞安博士周游世界为他的书搜集资料。

entry.def: A gathering is a group of people meeting together for a particular purpose.

example.ex: ...the twenty-second annual gathering of the South Pacific Forum.
example.tran: 第22届南太平洋论坛年会

entry.def: If there is gathering darkness, the light is gradually decreasing, usually because it is nearly night.

example.ex: The lighthouse beam was quite distinct in the gathering dusk.
example.tran: 灯塔的光束在渐浓的暮色中清晰可见。

means.word_mean: 1. a group of persons together in one place
4. sewing consisting of small folds or puckers made by pulling tight a thread in a line of stitching

Sentence.sentence: Talking about an important gathering on Tuesday.
Why is it even interested in all those out-of-printlibrary books, most of which have been gathering dust on forgotten shelves for decades?
Greene said at a recent gathering at the Aspen Institute.

sentences.en: He called on Mr. White to speak at the gathering.
sentences.cn: 他请怀特先生在集会上讲话。
